text: Abu Hena Bablu is a Bangladeshi Cinematographer. He won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Cinematography for the films Pita Mata Sontan (1991). ==Selected films== * Garmil - 1976 * Oshikkhito - 1978 * Gangchil - 1980 * Qurbani - 1985 * Ashanti - 1986 * Lalu Mastan - 1987 * Pita Mata Sontan - 1991 * Lokkhir Songsar - 1992 * Katha Dao - 1997 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text- align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !!
